snippet.title: Let's Play GBA 332: Mail de Cute (J)
snippet.description:
So, this is a kids game. It seems to have only 1 minigame which is... video poker?

And every 1-2 minutes, when the timer runs out, you are allowed to answer an email/postcard from a friend. But I don't really understand why. I'm assuming if you answer enough, they will send you gifts or something.
